author: spencer_tb
content: I'm very much in favour of an `eth_config` RPC call. Could we have the fork as an input?

author: _shemnon
content: The intent is to return what the client is actually running right now, and what it is running next.  Clients _will_ be unaware of other networks and may not be able to switch on fork.  We also need to keep in mind L2s will want to use this and they have different fork names too, so "current" and "next" is the most common concerns.

author: spencer_tb
content: This call could be added to the `rpc-compat` simulator in hive quite easily so I like it a lot!
